languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next non-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} inflicts the intimidated effect on the first target {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the attack and all enemies in a 5-cell radius around that target.
The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by intimidated enemies is reduced by −{uip|DamagePenalty|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% until the Operative's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is doubled for enemies with less than {uip|MinimumArmour|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Следующая {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}атака{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативника{/g} (кроме {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атак по области{/g}) накладывает эффект "испуг" на первую цель, получившую {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g}, и на всех противников в радиусе 5 клеток от нее.
Испуганные противники наносят на {uip|DamagePenalty|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% меньше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} до следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} оперативника. Этот {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативный эффект{/g} удваивается для противников, у которых меньше {uip|MinimumArmour|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The Adept's next non-area attack inflicts the intimidated effect on the first target hit by the attack and all enemies in a 5-cell radius around that target.
The damage dealt by intimidated enemies is reduced by -<u>2×(PER bonus)%</u> until the Adept's next turn. This negative effect is doubled for enemies with less than <u>3×(INT bonus)%</u> armour.

The Adept's next non-area attack inflicts the intimidated effect on the first target hit by the attack and all enemies in a 5-cell radius around that target.
The damage dealt by intimidated enemies is reduced by −<u>(2 × PER bonus)</u>% until the Adept's next turn. This negative effect is doubled for enemies with less than <u>(3 × INT bonus)</u>% armour.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next non-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} inflicts the intimidated effect on the first target {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the attack and all enemies in a 5-cell radius around that target.
The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by intimidated enemies is reduced by −{uip|DamagePenalty|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% until the Operative's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is doubled for enemies with less than {uip|MinimumArmour|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

The Adept's next non-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} inflicts the intimidated {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} on the first target {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g} by the attack and all enemies in a 5-cell radius around that target.
The damage dealt by intimidated enemies is reduced by −{uip|DamagePenalty|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% until the Adept's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative effect{/g} is doubled for enemies with less than {uip|MinimumArmour|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armour{/g}.

languages.text:
Следующая {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}атака{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативника{/g} (кроме {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атак по области{/g}) накладывает эффект "испуг" на первую цель, получившую {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g}, и на всех противников в радиусе 5 клеток от нее.
Испуганные противники наносят на {uip|DamagePenalty|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% меньше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} до следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} оперативника. Этот {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативный эффект{/g} удваивается для противников, у которых меньше {uip|MinimumArmour|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The Adept's next non-area attack inflicts the intimidated effect on the first target hit by the attack and all enemies in a 5-cell radius around that target.
The damage dealt by intimidated enemies is reduced by −<u>(2 × PER bonus)</u>% until the Adept's next turn. This negative effect is doubled for enemies with less than <u>(3 × INT bonus)</u>% armour.

traits.locale_text:
Следующая атака адепта (кроме атак по области) накладывает эффект "испуг" на первую цель, получившую попадание, и на всех противников в радиусе 5 клеток от нее.
Испуганные противники наносят на <u>(2 × бонус ВОС)</u>% меньше урона до следующего хода адепта. Этот негативный эффект удваивается для противников, у которых меньше <u>(3 × бонус ИНТ)</u>% брони.

Следующая атака адепта (кроме атак по области) накладывает эффект "испуг" на первую цель, получившую попадание, и на всех противников в радиусе 5 клеток от нее.
Испуганные противники наносят на <u>(2 × бонус ВОС)</u>% меньше урона до следующего хода адепта. Этот негативный эффект удваивается для противников, у которых меньше <u>(3 × бонус ИНТ)</u>% брони.

Следующая атака адепта (кроме атак по области) накладывает эффект "испуг" на первую цель, получившую попадание, и на всех противников в радиусе 5 клеток от нее.
Испуганные противники наносят на {uip|DamagePenalty|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% меньше урона до следующего хода адепта. Этот негативный эффект удваивается для противников, у которых меньше {uip|MinimumArmour|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% брони.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}的下次非{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人时，会对首个目标以及5格内的所有敌人施加“恐吓”效果。
受到“恐吓”效果影响的敌人，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低{uip|DamagePenalty|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}%，效果持续至特工的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止。如果敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}低于{uip|MinimumArmour|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}%，则此{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}造成双倍减值。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next non-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} inflicts the intimidated effect on the first target {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the attack and all enemies in a 5-cell radius around that target.
The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by intimidated enemies is reduced by −{uip|DamagePenalty|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% until the Operative's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is doubled for enemies with less than {uip|MinimumArmour|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
技师的下次非{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人时，会对首个目标以及5格内的所有敌人施加“恐吓”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}。
受到“恐吓”效果影响的敌人，造成的伤害降低<u>（2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%，直到技师的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止。如果敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}低于<u>（3×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}加值）</u>，则这个{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}负面效果{/g}造成双倍减值。

技师的下次非{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人时，会对首个目标以及5格内的所有敌人施加“恐吓”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}。
受到“恐吓”效果影响的敌人，造成的伤害降低{uip|DamagePenalty|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}%，直到技师的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止。如果敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}低于{uip|MinimumArmour|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}，则这个{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}负面效果{/g}造成双倍减值。

languages.text:
次の{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}の非{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}を受けた最初のターゲットおよびそのターゲットから5セル以内の範囲の全ての敵に威嚇効果を与える。
威嚇を受けた敵による{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}はオペレーターの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで{uip|DamagePenalty|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}%減少する。この{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}ネガティブ効果{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が{uip|MinimumArmour|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}%未満の敵に対して2倍になる。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next non-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} inflicts the intimidated effect on the first target {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the attack and all enemies in a 5-cell radius around that target.
The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by intimidated enemies is reduced by −{uip|DamagePenalty|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% until the Operative's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is doubled for enemies with less than {uip|MinimumArmour|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
次のアデプトの非{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}攻撃を受けた{/g}最初のターゲットおよびそのターゲットから5セル以内の範囲の全ての敵に威嚇{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を与える。
威嚇を受けた敵によるダメージはアデプトの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで<u>(2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>％減少する。この{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}ネガティブ効果{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}が<u>(3×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}ボーナス)</u>％未満の敵に対して2倍になる。

次のアデプトの非{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}攻撃を受けた{/g}最初のターゲットおよびそのターゲットから5セル以内の範囲の全ての敵に威嚇{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を与える。
威嚇を受けた敵によるダメージはアデプトの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで{uip|DamagePenalty|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}％減少する。この{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}ネガティブ効果{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}が{uip|MinimumArmour|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}％未満の敵に対して2倍になる。

languages.text:
El próximo ataque que no sea de {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}área{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agente{/g} inflige el efecto intimidado al primer objetivo {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactado{/g} por el ataque y a todos los enemigos en un radio de 5 casillas del objetivo.
El {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que infligen los enemigos intimidados se reduce en −{uip|DamagePenalty|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4} % hasta el próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del agente. Este {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efecto negativo{/g} se duplica para los enemigos con menos de {uip|MinimumArmour|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next non-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} inflicts the intimidated effect on the first target {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the attack and all enemies in a 5-cell radius around that target.
The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by intimidated enemies is reduced by −{uip|DamagePenalty|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% until the Operative's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is doubled for enemies with less than {uip|MinimumArmour|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
El próximo ataque que no sea de {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}área{/g} del adepto inflige el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} intimidado al primer objetivo {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactado{/g} por el ataque y a todos los enemigos en un radio de 5 casillas del objetivo.
El daño que infligen los enemigos intimidados se reduce en −<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g})</u> % hasta el próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del adepto. Este {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efecto negativo{/g} se duplica para los enemigos con menos de <u>(3 × bonificador por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g}.

El próximo ataque que no sea de {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}área{/g} del adepto inflige el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} intimidado al primer objetivo {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactado{/g} por el ataque y a todos los enemigos en un radio de 5 casillas del objetivo.
El daño que infligen los enemigos intimidados se reduce en −{uip|DamagePenalty|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4} % hasta el próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del adepto. Este {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efecto negativo{/g} se duplica para los enemigos con menos de {uip|MinimumArmour|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4} % de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g}.

languages.text:
Der nächste Nicht-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Agenten{/g} fügt dem ersten Ziel, das von dem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g} wird, und allen Feinden in einem Radius von 5 Feldern um dieses Ziel herum den Effekt Eingeschüchtert zu.
Der von eingeschüchterten Feinden verursachte {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} wird bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des Agenten um −{uip|DamagePenalty|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4} % reduziert. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative Effekt{/g} wird bei Feinden mit weniger als {uip|MinimumArmour|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4} % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} verdoppelt.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next non-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} inflicts the intimidated effect on the first target {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the attack and all enemies in a 5-cell radius around that target.
The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by intimidated enemies is reduced by −{uip|DamagePenalty|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% until the Operative's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is doubled for enemies with less than {uip|MinimumArmour|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Der nächste Nicht-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} des Adepten fügt dem ersten Ziel, das von dem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}getroffen{/g} wird, und allen Gegnern in einem Radius von 5 Feldern um dieses Ziel herum den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} eingeschüchtert zu.
Der von eingeschüchterten Gegnern verursachte Schaden wird bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des Adepten um -<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}WAH-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u>% reduziert. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative Effekt{/g} wird bei Gegnern mit weniger als <u>(3 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT-{/g}Bonus)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} verdoppelt.

Der nächste Nicht-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} des Adepten fügt dem ersten Ziel, das von dem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}getroffen{/g} wird, und allen Gegnern in einem Radius von 5 Feldern um dieses Ziel herum den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} eingeschüchtert zu.
Der von eingeschüchterten Gegnern verursachte Schaden wird bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des Adepten um -{uip|DamagePenalty|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% reduziert. Dieser {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative Effekt{/g} wird bei Gegnern mit weniger als {uip|MinimumArmour|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} verdoppelt.

languages.text:
L'attaque suivante de {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}l'Opérateur{/g}, à condition qu'il ne s'agisse pas d'une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g}, inflige l'effet Intimidation à la première cible {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchée{/g} et à tous les ennemis présents dans un rayon de 5 cases autour de cette cible.
Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} qu'infligent les ennemis frappés par l'effet Intimidation sont réduits de −{uip|DamagePenalty|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% jusqu'au {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'Opérateur. Cet {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effet négatif{/g} est doublé pour les ennemis dont {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}l'armure{/g} est inférieure à < {uip|MinimumArmour|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}%.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s next non-{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} inflicts the intimidated effect on the first target {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by the attack and all enemies in a 5-cell radius around that target.
The {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} dealt by intimidated enemies is reduced by −{uip|DamagePenalty|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% until the Operative's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} is doubled for enemies with less than {uip|MinimumArmour|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
L'attaque suivante de l'Adepte, à condition qu'il ne s'agisse pas d'une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g}, inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Intimidation{/g} à la première cible {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touchée{/g} et à tous les ennemis présents dans un rayon de 5 cases autour de cette cible.
Les dégâts qu'infligent les ennemis frappés par l'effet Intimidation sont réduits de -<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g})</u> % jusqu'au {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'Adepte. Cet {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effet négatif{/g} est doublé pour les ennemis dont l'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} est inférieure à <u>(3 × bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g})</u> %.

L'attaque suivante de l'Adepte, à condition qu'il ne s'agisse pas d'une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g}, inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Intimidation{/g} à la première cible {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touchée{/g} et à tous les ennemis présents dans un rayon de 5 cases autour de cette cible.
Les dégâts qu'infligent les ennemis frappés par l'effet Intimidation sont réduits de -{uip|DamagePenalty|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4} % jusqu'au {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'Adepte. Cet {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effet négatif{/g} est doublé pour les ennemis dont l'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} est inférieure à {uip|MinimumArmour|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4} %.

L'attaque suivante de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Adepte{/g}, à condition qu'il ne s'agisse pas d'une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g}, inflige l'effet Intimidation à la première cible {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchée{/g} et à tous les ennemis présents dans un rayon de 5 cases autour de cette cible.
Les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} qu'infligent les ennemis frappés par l'effet Intimidation sont réduits de −{uip|DamagePenalty|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4} % jusqu'au {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'Adepte. Cet {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effet négatif{/g} est doublé pour les ennemis dont l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} est inférieure à {uip|MinimumArmour|aedb4d2a2fd049db9c3f61b6737043a4} %.
